nodes.documentation:
@dev Checks if the given user is a registered business owner
@param _user The address of the user to check
nodes.name: onlyBusinessOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Checks if the given user is not registered on the platform
@param _user The address of the user to check
nodes.name: onlyNotRegistered
registerBusinessOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the data of a specific user if it's a registered business owner
@param _user The address of the business owner whose data to return
nodes.name: login

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns a dynamic array containing all registered business owners' addresses
nodes.name: getAllBusinessOwners

nodes.documentation:
@dev Checks if the given user is a registered business owner
@param _user The address of the user to check
nodes.name: onlyBusinessOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Checks if the given user is not registered on the platform
@param _user The address of the user to check
nodes.name: onlyNotRegistered
registerBusinessOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the data of a specific user if it's a registered business owner
@param _user The address of the business owner whose data to return
nodes.name: login

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns a dynamic array containing all registered business owners' addresses
nodes.name: getAllBusinessOwners

constructor.details: Sets the correct instance of ContractManager so that the contract may be able to call functions from other     contracts

params._manager: The address of the instance of ContractManager

getAllBusinessOwners().details: Returns a dynamic array containing all registered business owners' addresses

login(address).details: Returns the data of a specific user if it's a registered business owner

params._user: The address of the business owner whose data to return

registerBusinessOwner(bytes32,bytes32,by.details: Registers the user who calls this function as a business owner

params._CE: The certified e-mail of the business to register
params._VATNumber: The VAT number of the business to register
params._businessName: The name of the business to register
params._location: The location of the business to register
